arts.ttl: Luciano Acosta, rookie goalkeeper Michael Collodi lead Dallas to 1-0 victory over Real Salt Lake
arts.sum: Luciano Acosta scored in first-half stoppage time after Real Salt Lake lost rookie Ariath Piol to a red card in the 23rd minute, and FC Dallas held on for a 1-0 victory behind goalkeeper Michael Collodi in his league debut at America First Field on Saturday night. Piol, a 20-year-old forward, did not last long in his fourth career start for Real Salt Lake (2-3-0).

arts.ttl: Evander Edges Closer to Messi: MLS Headline Transfers Thriving for FC Cincinnati, Atlanta United, LA Galaxy
arts.sum: Evander, Christian Ramirez and Emmauel Latte Lath starred for their new clubs on Matchday 5.

arts.ttl: 3 Must-Watch MLS Games This Weekend: LA Galaxy, Vancouver Whitecaps, Atlanta United
arts.sum: Vancouver Whitecaps FC's Sebastian Berhalter will face his dad, Gregg Berhalter, and the Chicago Fire.
